body_html: Thanks for the suggestion - assuming there are no knock-on effects to the full softmax case, we should fix the sample code to avoid the performance pitfall on sampled softmax. I'll assign this to the original author, @lukaszkaiser, in case there's a reason to avoid doing this, but this is probably an area where we'd appreciate contributions.

body: Thanks for the suggestion - assuming there are no knock-on effects to the full softmax case, we should fix the sample code to avoid the performance pitfall on sampled softmax. I'll assign this to the original author, @lukaszkaiser, in case there's a reason to avoid doing this, but this is probably an area where we'd appreciate contributions.
